articles.title: Eric Dane, 'Grey's Anatomy' and 'Euphoria' star, dies at 53 nearly 1 year after revealing ALS diagnosis - Yahoo
articles.description: The actor revealed in April 2025 that he had been diagnosed with the rare neurodegenerative disease.
articles.content:
Actor Eric Dane died of complications related to amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) on Thursday. He was 53.
Danes family confirmed his death with a statement to multiple outlets, saying that he had… [+6861 chars]

articles.title: James Cameron Sounds Alarm Over Netflix-Warner Bros. Deal, Backs Paramount - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The director's chief concern is the proposed merger's impact on movie theaters, which depend on money from tentpoles that he claims may see shorter theatrical releases or be sent directly to streaming if Netflix prevails.
articles.content:
James Cameron is going to bat for Paramount in the bidding war for Warner Bros. Discovery.

articles.title: Hilary Duff Is Ready for Her Pop Return - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Hilary Duff takes us inside her incredibly relatable comeback album 'Luck … or Something.'
